author: breser
msg: Fix incorrect quoting in swig.m4.
* build/ac-macros/swig.m4
Use [] not "".

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1928: Fix a memory bug in libsvn_wc introduced in r9882.
svn_wc__entries_write clears the pruned entries hash repeatedly, which
causes it to be regenerated frequently.  For now, just have
svn_wc__entry_modify handle the case when the two cached entries
hashes are identical so that the memory optimization in prune_deleted
that was removed in r9882 can go back in.  This gets memory usage back
to O(n) while time spent committing will still be O(n^2) until all the
accessors of the two entries hashes can be improved to modify them in
parallel.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c
(svn_wc__entry_modify): Handle the case when the hidden and pruned
entries hashes are the same by not attempting to update both
hashes.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/lock.c
(prune_deleted): Re-add the optimization which checks to see if the
two entries caches would be identical.

author: lundblad
msg: Error message consistency.
* libsvn_client/diff.c, libsvn_client/copy.c, libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c,
libsvn_fs_fs/err.c: Fix capitalization and remove trailing dots.

author: lundblad
msg: Updated Swedish translation.
* po/sv.po: More translations and fixes.

author: breser
msg: Use explicit package::variablename for versioning vars in the Perl bindings.
* subversion/bindings/swig/perl/native/Core.pm
For whatever reason ActiveState's perl is complaining about this.
Also it should have been $SVN::Core::VERSION not $SVN::Base::VERSION.
